You will be able to see how your work has an immediate, tangible impact on every day operations in a rapidly growing and Analytics focused company. Experience in optimization/operations research projects, either academic or industrial.  Ability to demonstrate strong analytical and problem solving skills with operational challenges, frame real-life problems in mathematical or algorithmic forms, and take concepts to implementation.  Experience with object-oriented programming in at least one programming language, e.g. Python, C++, Java.  Ability to prioritize and manage projects to completion with some guidance from team lead.  Strong communication skills.  It would be great if you also had   Experience in implementing optimization/algorithmic techniques for Airline / Train / Logistics / manufacturing capacity planning or scheduling problems.
